AlbengaTess

A series of pictures I took for Tess Driessens, as she is building her website. We shot one day in Klimax, one of the biggest climbing gyms in Europe, and one day in Belgium's finest crag: Freyr

All photos ©2017 Fabian Poels ~ hosting by bonos.be ~ logo by annelienvandenbosch.be
